name: Plucky Plugs
description:
Notes: 

  • Don't be alarmed by the black screen. The game has a slightly long start-up time.
  • While intended to be played with another person this game is totally playable by yourself.
  • This is a local multiplayer game, but high scores are stored online so that players can compete for the highest score.

Tutorial:

Pluggo and Plugga are looking for as many golden outlets as they can find. Work with a friend or on your own to help them grab as many outlets as you can.

 Watch out for random short circuits and cranky lightning balls. Remember that Pluggo and Plugga are connected so make sure you don't pull your partner into danger. All it takes is three hits and you'll both be down for the count!

Controls:

To move Pluggo  (blue), you use WASD; for Plugga (pink), you use the arrow keys.

Happy high score hunting!

Developed for:

Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM

Credit:

  • The scoreboard is accomplished using LootLocker.
